LanguageData.RecipeRequiresMechanitor: The recipe {0} requires a mechanitor to work on it. None of your colonists are mechanitors, so nobody will do this bill.
LanguageData.AutofeedModeTooltipUrgent: {FEEDER_nameDef} will feed {BABY_nameDef} day or night, even if {FEEDER_nameDef} is not assigned to childcare or is incapable of childcare.
LanguageData.IdeoExposureNoExposure: {BABY_labelShort} has not been exposed to any ideoligions yet.
LanguageData.IdeoExposureNoExposureDetail: {BABY_pronoun} can be exposed to ideoligions by interacting with followers of an ideoligion. These interactions include being breastfed, carried, played with, and more. At the age of {CHILDAGE} {BABY_labelShort} will join one of the ideoligions {BABY_pronoun} has been exposed to.
LanguageData.IdeoExposurePointsTooltipJoinLikelihood: {BABY_labelShort} is {PERCENT} likely to join the ideoligion {IDEO_name}.
LanguageData.IdeoExposurePointsTooltipJoinDescription: As {BABY_labelShort} interacts with followers of an ideoligion {BABY_pronoun} becomes more likely to join that ideoligion. {BABY_labelShort} will join one of the ideoligions {BABY_pronoun} has been exposed to at the age of {CHILDAGE}.
LanguageData.IdeoExposurePointsTooltipExposureDescrip: Ideoligion exposure is measured by exposure points. Interactions like being breastfed, carried, or played with will cause {BABY_labelShort} to gain exposure points for the ideoligions followed by those {BABY_pronoun} interacts with.
LanguageData.CantRomanceInitiateMessagePrisoner: {0_labelShort} cannot try to romance because {0_pronoun} is a prisoner.
LanguageData.CantRomanceInitiateMessageSlave: {0_labelShort} cannot try to romance because {0_pronoun} is a slave.
LanguageData.CantRomanceInitiateMessageAsexual: {0_labelShort} cannot try to romance because {0_pronoun} has the asexual trait.
LanguageData.CantRomanceInitiateMessageDowned: {0_labelShort} cannot try to romance because {0_pronoun} is incapacitated.
LanguageData.CantRomanceInitiateMessageDrafted: {0_labelShort} cannot try to romance because {0_pronoun} is drafted.
LanguageData.CantRomanceInitiateMessageMentalState: {0_labelShort} cannot try to romance because {0_pronoun} is in an unfit mental state.
LanguageData.CantRomanceInitiateMessageTalk: {0_labelShort} cannot try to romance because {0_pronoun} is unable to speak.
LanguageData.CantRomanceInitiateMessageCooldown: {0_labelShort} tried romancing recently and must wait {1} until trying again.
LanguageData.RomanceExistingRelationshipWarning: Having {INITIATOR_nameDef} romance {TARGET_nameDef} could sow resentment among existing partners, lead to breakups, and cause altercations.
LanguageData.PrisonBreakingDisabledDueToGene: Prison breaking is disabled by {GENE_label} gene.
